<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
<h4>setBottomRightModel</h4>
<pre>public&nbsp;<a href="../../../../BT/modules/ObjectedOrientedPetriNet/mainContent/PNMainContentModel.html" title="class in BT.modules.ObjectedOrientedPetriNet.mainContent">PNMainContentModel</a>&nbsp;setBottomRightModel(<a href="../../../../GUI/BottomRightContentModel.html" title="class in GUI">BottomRightContentModel</a>&nbsp;bottomRightModel)</pre>
<div class="block">Method for setting bottom right content model.</div>
<dl><dt><span class="strong">Parameters:</span></dt><dd><code>bottomRightModel</code> - BottomRightContentModel with buttons and panels for further settings.</dd>
<dt><span class="strong">Returns:</span></dt><dd>PNMainContentModel for further use.</dd></dl>
</li>
</ul>
<a name="setMainContent(BT.modules.ObjectedOrientedPetriNet.PNMainContent)">
<!--   -->
</a>
<ul class="blockList">
<li class="blockList">
